title: Implement removeNode Collections API
description:
Add a removeNode Collections API to remove the given node from the collection i.e. all indexes belonging to the specified collection/shard will be unloaded from the given node.

Parameters:

	node
	collection
	shard (optional)
	route (optional)

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: This has been implemented by SOLR-5310 by the name of deleteReplica instead of removeNode so this issue is no longer required.
